speaker: President. −
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0262/2008 ) by Jutta Haug, on behalf of the Committee on Budgets, on the 2009 budget: First reflections on the 2009 Preliminary Draft Budget and mandate for the conciliation – Section III – Commission (2008/2025).
